remarks: An alternative to having a well-order on ` R ` in ~ wemapso is to restrict the function set to finitely-supported functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 1-Jul-2019.)
statement:
wemapso.t $e |- T = { <. x , y >. | E. z e. A ( ( x ` z ) S ( y ` z ) /\ A. w e. A ( w R z -> ( x ` w ) = ( y ` w ) ) ) } $.
wemapso2.u $e |- U = { x e. ( B ^m A ) | x finSupp Z } $.
wemapso2 $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ R Or A /\ S Or B ) -> T Or U ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B x $.
$d R w x y z $.
$d S w x y z $.
$d Z x $.
